product_name: Moving Comfort Urban Gym Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a wide waistband for a flattering fit and fun gathers at the lower legs, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym capris are soft, moisture-wicking and ready to keep you comfortable during any workout. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps you stay comfortable and focused on the workout. Wide, ribbed waistband offers a flattering fit, and lower leg hems may be gathered up with ties or drawn down for additional coverage. Hidden pocket in waistband stores accessories. The Moving Comfort Urban Gym capris offer a next-to-skin fit and flatlock seams to reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: With a wide waistband for a flattering fit and fun gathers at the lower legs, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym capris are soft, moisture-wicking and ready to keep you comfortable during any workout.
